meanings.definition: A small room or monument, cut in rock or built of stone, in which a dead person is laid or buried.
meanings.sent1: The ancient sepulchre was carved into the mountain.
meanings.sent2: Visitors paid their respects at the family sepulchre.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel mistook the sepulchre for a cozy home.
meanings.sent4: The sepulchre of memories held within her heart.
meanings.sent5: The moonlight cast eerie shadows over the old sepulchre.

meanings.definition: A tomb, grave, or burial place.
meanings.sent1: The royal sepulchre was adorned with intricate carvings.
meanings.sent2: The sepulchre was a solemn reminder of the past.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played hide-and-seek around the sepulchre.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams lay dormant in the sepulchre of forgotten desires.
meanings.sent5: The sepulchre stood as a silent guardian of history.
